extensionMetaData.description: the meta data to describe this extension

id.description: a unique identifier specific to this extension

name.description: a user-friendly name for this extension

type.title: Type
type.description: the type of the configuration element's data

title.title: Title
title.description: a user-friendly title for the configuration element

description.title: Description
description.description: additional information about the configuration element or its data

required.title: Required
required.description: whether or not a user must specify a value for this configuration element

allowedValues.title: Allowed Values
allowedValues.description: a set of string values the user may choose from for this configuration element's value

defaultValues.title: Default Values
defaultValues.description: a set of default string values, most often it will be an array of size = 1
